snippet: Top-ranked Victoria Azarenka needed almost three hours to outlast Maria Sharapova, 3-6, 6-2, 6-4, but Serena Williams took only 64 minutes to eliminate Sara Errani in the semifinals.
abstract: Victoria Azarenka outlasts Maria Sharapova and Serena Williams eliminates Sara Errani in the women's semifinals of the United States Open; other tournament results noted.

byline.original: By LYNN ZINSER and JOHN MARTIN

lead_paragraph: Top-ranked Victoria Azarenka needed almost three hours to outlast Maria Sharapova, 3-6, 6-2, 6-4, but Serena Williams took only 64 minutes to eliminate Sara Errani in the semifinals.

headline.seo: Williams Will Face Azarenka in U.S. Open Final
headline.main: For Azarenka and Williams, Paths Diverge but Go to Final
headline.print_headline: For Azarenka And Williams, Paths Diverge But Go to Final
